description: Universo Vigil is a rapidly growing company based in Mendoza, known for its diverse offerings in wine, beer, and gastronomy. Founded by renowned oenologist Alejandro Vigil, the initiative emphasizes sustainability, community relations, and innovation. With over 25 production units, including the Michelin-starred Casa Vigil restaurant, the company focuses on high-quality, locally sourced products while fostering partnerships with local producers and promoting environmental responsibility. Their commitment to social impact and education further enhances their community engagement.
name: Universo Vigil
